Class OldMcDSong

  • java.lang.Object
    • OldMcDSong

  • public class OldMcDSong
extends java.lang.Object
    Old MacDonald Had a Farm song lyric generator. Each verse introduces an animal by its name and the sound it makes. The introduction is followed by the sounds of previously introduced animals, in reverse order.
    Version:
    20180920.1.0
    Author:
    Dr. Jody Paul

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OldMcDSong()
      Constructs a song with a default set of animals.
      OldMcDSong(java.util.ArrayList<Animal> theAnimals)
      Constructs a lyric generator with specified animals.

      Creates a verse that introduces a specifed animal and repeats the sounds of previously seen animals.

        public OldMcDSong(java.util.ArrayList<Animal> theAnimals)
        Constructs a lyric generator with specified animals.
        Parameters:
        theAnimals - the animals to sing about

    • Method Detail

      • couplet

        public java.lang.String couplet(Animal anim)
        Creates the two-line couplet for an already seen animal. Each line is terminated with a newline character. The structure of these lines is as follows: 
         A sound sound here, a sound sound there
 Here a sound, there a sound, everywhere a sound sound
        Parameters:
        anim - the animal
        Returns:
        the two-line couplet

      • lyrics

        public java.lang.String lyrics()
        Creates lyrics for all verses of this song. A single blank line appears before each verse.
        Returns:
        the ready-to-display lyrics

      • verse

        public java.lang.String verse(Animal introAnimal,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Animal> oldAnimals)
        Creates a verse that introduces a specifed animal and repeats the sounds of previously seen animals.
        Parameters:
        introAnimal - the animal to introduce
        oldAnimals - the previously seen animals
        Returns:
        the ready-to-display lyrics

      • verseIntro

        public java.lang.String verseIntro(Animal theAnimal)
        Creates the first four lines of a new verse. Each line is terminated with a newline character. The structure of these lines is as follows: 
         Old MacDonald had a farm, E-I-E-I-O
 And on that farm he had a name, E-I-E-I-O
 With a sound sound here and a sound sound there
 Here a sound, there a sound, everywhere a sound sound
        Parameters:
        theAnimal - the animal introduced by this verse
        Returns:
        the ready-to-display lines of lyric
